name: RTCOutboundRtpStreamStats.qualityLimitationReason
description: The qualityLimitationReason property of the RTCOutboundRtpStreamStats dictionary is a string indicating the reason why the media quality in the stream is currently being reduced by the codec during encoding, or none if no quality reduction is being performed.

refs.name: Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCOutboundRtpStreamStats.qualityLimitationReason' in Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API.
